attributes.action: Rebuild the 1872 facade of Highbury & Islington station
attributes.additional_details:
On behalf of millions of users and residents, we would like to see the local council and government push for the reconstruction of the facade of the original 1872 Highbury & Islington station, a photograph of which can be see here: http://www.flickr.com/photos/13256979@N08/2766618080/in/photostream/
We believe such a project could return a dirty neglected corner of Islington to its rightful splendour.
